TopicTitle: Save Game and Revert Issues [Revert to Launch then Revert to VAB loaded quicksave then CTD]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win 10 | CPU: i9-11900k | GPU: 1060T | RAM: 32GB

 

Scenario: Launched ship, almost got to Mun. Had to revert to launch, worked as expected. from that launch, I then had to revert to VAB. Instead it loaded me to what must have been a quick save near the Mun? then game crashed to desktop. After I started the game again and loaded my save file, it loaded me to the same quick save, the ship exploded instantly leaving me to just jump to vab without revert
